column6: Will Skaar and Princess Omaka join forces to protect the refugees fleeing from Axeman Bone's merciless barbarians -- or will they tear each other to pieces in the radioactive swamps?
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller:Ron Garney | inker:Butch Guice | colorist:Paul Mounts | writer:Greg Pak
